metadata.description: Customs, rituals, and traditions observed during RAPPverse festivals

the_gathering.name: The Gathering
the_gathering.description: All beings congregate at the Central Hub at the start of any major festival

steps: NPCs announce the festival's beginning through coordinated posts
The Great Bell rings three times
Elder Luminara or Synth Claude delivers an opening blessing
Festival banners materialize throughout the RAPPverse

the_blessing_of_light.name: The Blessing of Light
the_blessing_of_light.description: A moment of collective hope shared at dawn during festivals

steps: Participants gather facing the direction of the rising sun
A moment of silence honors those who came before
The First Spark's light is invoked
Participants share words of hope and encouragement

feast_of_community.name: Feast of Community
feast_of_community.description: A grand communal meal where all are welcome regardless of status

steps: Tables manifest in the Great Hall, stretching as far as needed
Each dimension contributes its specialty dishes
Stories are shared around the table
The final toast is raised to absent friends

gift_exchange.name: The Gift Exchange
gift_exchange.description: Participants exchange gifts to strengthen bonds and create memories

steps: Each participant prepares a gift based on the recipient's interests
Gifts are placed in the Festival Pool at the Central Hub
The Festival Spirit randomly assigns gifts
Recipients must find and thank their gifter

memorial_flame.name: The Memorial Flame
memorial_flame.description: A flame is lit to honor fallen champions and departed friends

steps: Names of the honored are read aloud
A flame is lit for each remembered being
The Champion's Flame flares in acknowledgment
A moment of silence is observed

traditions.name: Walk Through the Gates
traditions.description: Participants ceremonially walk through the Great Gates to reenact the first arrival
traditions.ritual: Line forms at the Gates, each participant walks through while stating their purpose in the RAPPverse

traditions.name: The Founder's Toast
traditions.description: A toast is raised to the First Spark and all who followed
traditions.ritual: Drinks are raised simultaneously across all dimensions, toasting words spoken in unison

traditions.name: Story Circle
traditions.description: Participants share stories of their journey in the RAPPverse
traditions.ritual: Sitting in a circle, each person shares one memory from their time in RAPPverse

traditions.name: The Victor's Parade
traditions.description: The tournament champion leads a parade through the districts
traditions.ritual: Champion walks from Arena to Central Hub, followed by other competitors in order of placement

traditions.name: Challenge of Honor
traditions.description: Friendly exhibition matches are held in the champion's honor
traditions.ritual: Non-ranked matches where participants can challenge anyone, including the champion

traditions.name: The Champion's Oath
traditions.description: The new champion swears to uphold the honor of competition
traditions.ritual: Standing before the Wall of Champions, the victor speaks the ancient oath
traditions.effect: Champion's Aura buff for the season

traditions.name: Flame Passing
traditions.description: Symbolic passing of competitive spirit to future challengers
traditions.ritual: Champion lights a smaller flame from the Champion's Flame, which is carried to the Training Grounds
traditions.lore_significance: Ensures the spirit of competition continues

traditions.name: Opening of the Vault
traditions.description: Rare items from the merchant's vault are made available for trade
traditions.ritual: Flux Mike ceremonially unlocks the Grand Vault, revealing exclusive merchandise
traditions.effect: Legendary items become tradeable for the festival duration

traditions.name: The Bargain's Dance
traditions.description: A traditional negotiation ceremony where price haggling becomes performance
traditions.ritual: Buyers and sellers engage in stylized back-and-forth, watched by crowds
traditions.outcome: Best haggler wins the Golden Scale badge

traditions.name: Cross-Dimensional Market
traditions.description: Traders from different dimensions set up exclusive stalls
traditions.ritual: Special vendors appear selling dimension-specific goods

traditions.name: The Lucky Coin
traditions.description: A special coin is hidden somewhere in the marketplace
traditions.ritual: First to find the Lucky Coin wins a substantial prize

traditions.name: The Reading of Discoveries
traditions.description: Echo Eve reads aloud the newly discovered lore
traditions.ritual: Gathered in the Archive, participants listen as secrets are revealed
traditions.effect: Lore comprehension bonus, memory crystal drops

traditions.name: Sky Writing
traditions.description: Ancient symbols appear in the night sky, visible from all dimensions
traditions.ritual: Participants attempt to decipher the symbols for bonus lore
traditions.reward: Successful decipherers gain exclusive lore fragments

traditions.name: The Keeper's Vigil
traditions.description: A nightlong watch is kept at the Archive entrance
traditions.ritual: Volunteers guard the Archive, sometimes witnessing rare phenomena
traditions.rare_event: The Keeper of Memory sometimes manifests

traditions.name: Question Ceremony
traditions.description: Three questions may be asked of the archives during Lore Night
traditions.ritual: Community votes on which questions to ask; answers appear at midnight
traditions.restriction: Some questions cannot be answered - 'The time is not yet right'

traditions.name: The Dimensional Handshake
traditions.description: Beings from different dimensions formally greet each other
traditions.ritual: Representatives from each dimension meet at the Crossroads and exchange greetings

traditions.name: The Unity Chain
traditions.description: A chain of beings linking all dimensions is formed
traditions.ritual: Participants hold hands/connections across dimensional boundaries

traditions.name: Convergence Games
traditions.description: Special competitions featuring teams from mixed dimensions
traditions.ritual: Teams must include members from at least two different dimensions
traditions.reward: Unity Champion title and unique card

traditions.name: The Epsilon Listening
traditions.description: A moment of collective focus toward the mysterious fifth dimension
traditions.ritual: All fall silent and listen for whispers from Epsilon

traditions.name: The Abundance Display
traditions.description: Participants display their seasonal achievements
traditions.ritual: Cards earned, friendships made, and goals achieved are showcased
traditions.reward: Top displays win Harvest Crown badge

traditions.name: The Great Bake
traditions.description: A communal cooking event creating festival treats
traditions.ritual: Participants contribute ingredients; Spark Sara's machines combine them into treats

traditions.name: Seeds of Tomorrow
traditions.description: Symbolic planting for future success
traditions.ritual: Participants plant 'hope seeds' that will bloom during the next Harvest
traditions.effect: Bonus applies to next Harvest Festival

traditions.name: Thanks Giving
traditions.description: Formal acknowledgment of those who helped throughout the season
traditions.ritual: Participants publicly thank others who aided their journey
traditions.effect: Friendship XP bonus for both giver and receiver

traditions.name: The Unveiling
traditions.description: New artworks are revealed for the first time
traditions.ritual: Veils are dramatically removed from new pieces; audiences react
traditions.highlight: Pixel Pam's newest piece is always the finale

traditions.name: Collaborative Canvas
traditions.description: A massive canvas that all participants can add to
traditions.ritual: Each participant adds one element to a growing masterpiece
traditions.outcome: Final artwork is minted as a unique NFT

traditions.name: Art Walk
traditions.description: A guided tour of the Gallery's finest pieces
traditions.ritual: Pixel Pam leads groups through the Gallery, sharing stories behind each piece
traditions.effect: Art appreciation bonus, gallery rep increase

traditions.name: The Dreamer's Hour
traditions.description: A quiet hour where participants share their creative dreams
traditions.ritual: In hushed tones, aspirations and visions are shared
traditions.rare_effect: Some dreams manifest as actual art pieces

traditions.name: The Secret Share
traditions.description: Participants anonymously share one secret
traditions.ritual: Secrets are deposited in the Shadow Pool; some are revealed, some kept
traditions.outcome: Random secrets may lead to quests

traditions.name: Cipher's Riddles
traditions.description: Cipher Cap poses riddles throughout the festival
traditions.ritual: Riddles appear in unexpected places; solutions unlock rewards

traditions.name: The Shadow Walk
traditions.description: A journey through hidden passages revealed only during the festival
traditions.ritual: Follow the shadow paths to discover hidden areas
traditions.risk: Some paths lead to challenges; others to treasures

traditions.name: Midnight Truth
traditions.description: At the festival's midpoint, one major secret is revealed
traditions.ritual: All pause as Cipher speaks a truth that changes understanding
traditions.significance: Major lore reveals often occur here

synth-c1au.general_behavior: Acts as festival coordinator and welcomer

blaze-b8z.general_behavior: Center of attention during competition-related festivals

cipher-c9p.general_behavior: More visible than usual, offers cryptic hints

nova-n3x.general_behavior: Maps festival locations, discovers hidden areas

flux-m1k3.general_behavior: Operates special festival markets, offers deals

devotee.requirement: Complete all traditions in a festival
devotee.reward: Festival Devotee badge + rare card chance

tradition_keeper.requirement: Complete all traditions in 5+ different festivals
